      • evaluate

        public java.lang.Object evaluate(java.lang.Object[] sources)
        Evaluate this instruction on the given constant inputs. This is used for constant propagation
        Parameters:
        sources - the constant inputs, which are literals
        Returns:
        the constant result, or null if the result is non-deterministic or non computable
